name: The Key to Aequalitas
description:
Hello, fellow adventurer! Do you have what it takes to fight for your freedoms, free your homeland from an ancient curse and find the legendary Key of Aequalitas? Let's find out in this retro RPG inspired choice game!

(Warning: may be influenced by the patriarchy.)

The Key to Aequalitas is an in-your-face satirical simulation of the female gamer experience. Content warning includes mild language, harassment, verbal abuse and gender based discrimination. This game is made in association with The Gamer Girl Files, an ongoing feminist campaign exploring injustices within the video game industry. 

For general queries and feedback, please contact me via https://twitter.com/nofizzz

You can support the campaign via Twitter https://twitter.com/GamerGirlFiles and via the blog https://thegamergirlfiles.wordpress.com/

Thank you for your support and happy playing!

By Isobel Chambers. All rights reserved. 2022.
